_Global-.PackageReleaseNotes: The 0.1.0 SkiaSharp Update brings the SkiaSharp front end to CSharpMath.

CSharpMath.Title: CSharpMath
CSharpMath.Description: C# LaTeX math rendering engine core. Can display beautiful math equations and symbols. Needs a front end to function. Currently, front end exists for iOS and SkiaSharp.

CSharpMath.Rendering.Title: CSharpMath.Rendering
CSharpMath.Rendering.Description: Rendering interface fror CSharpMath using Typography

CSharpMath.Text.Title: CSharpMath.Text
CSharpMath.Text.Description: A text renderer built on top of the CSharpMath math renderer

CSharpMath.Ios.Title: CSharpMath.Ios
CSharpMath.Ios.Description: The iOS front end for CSharpMath

CSharpMath.SkiaSharp.Title: CSharpMath.SkiaSharp
CSharpMath.SkiaSharp.Description: The SkiaSharp front end for CSharpMath

CSharpMath.Forms.Title: CSharpMath.Forms
CSharpMath.Forms.Description: The Xamarin.Forms front end for CSharpMath
